Articles.Content:
The goal is to create a fleet of spaceships consisting of different specifications. The ships must be able to operate from orbit with only a primary stage.

Use of secondary stages is allowed to achieve orbit, but must be discarded upon reaching it.

The types of ships are the following:

Shuttle - Very small, short range crafts used for transporting goods to other ships

Fighters - Small, single engine craft capable for short range intercept purposes. Operates off of Carrier

Bombers - Small, twin engine craft capable of short range attack purposes. Operates off of Carriers

Corvettes - Small to medium craft capable of independent operation

Frigates - Medium scout ships capable of carrying a small amount of shuttles (1 to 4)

Cruisers - Medium to large ships. Larger than Frigates, smaller than Dreadnoughts and Carriers

Carriers - Large to HUGE ships that carry fighters and bombers.

Dreadnoughts - Large to HUGE ships to bring death and destruction to all others

DEATH STAR - self explanatory...

Let\'s see if these things can be built! Please submit a picture and maybe upload your craft.

All parts may be used unless they could be seen as hacked.

Good luck! 8)
